name: CDAC (Chinese Development Assistance Council)
mission: To uplift lower-income Chinese families through educational, financial, and social programs.

name: MENDAKI (Council for the Development of Singapore Malay/Muslim Community)
mission: To support the educational and socio-economic advancement of the Malay/Muslim community.

name: Eurasian Association
mission: To preserve and promote Eurasian heritage and provide support for education and social causes.
programs: Social assistance for families in need

name: TCC (The Tamil Language and Cultural Society)
mission: To promote the Tamil language, culture, and heritage in Singapore.

name: Sikh Welfare Council (SIKH COUNCIL)
mission: To provide welfare and social support to members of the Sikh community and beyond.
programs: Community support for elderly and disadvantaged individuals

name: PERGAS (Singapore Islamic Scholars & Religious Teachers Association)
focus: Malay/Muslim community with a focus on religious scholars and educators
mission: To enhance the socio-religious well-being of the Muslim community in Singapore.

name: Little India Shopkeepers and Heritage Association (LISHA)
focus: Indian business and cultural community in Little India
mission: To preserve the cultural heritage and promote the interests of the Indian community in Singapore.
programs: Cultural festivals and events (e.g., Deepavali celebrations)
Advocacy for business owners in Little India

name: Association of Muslim Professionals (AMP)
mission: To empower the Malay/Muslim community through professional development and social programs.
programs: Education and training for adults and youth
Research and advocacy for community advancement
